name: Jump Lattice Pro
description:
tap the screen and rolling、jumping！
Gameplay is introduced
1. Click on the screen, rolling hopping direction to change role
2. Avoid to magma, cone and ice, don't forget the hollow out of the pit, ha ha!
3. Run into obstacles will automatically change direction
4. Eat to rotate the props can be filled pit, running speed, increase the gold coinSuper interesting little game, and buy slow role within the app oh ~ ~ ~
